de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICSingleMode


  • public interface ICSingleMode
    Provides functions to load data ( SingleMode objects) the mail inbox SingleModeResult.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getSingleModeAPI().loadSingleModeOperatorList();

      • RESULT_LIMIT

        @Deprecated
static final Integer RESULT_LIMIT
        Deprecated. 
        Not in use. The limit is set from the config file (see singlemoduslimit or singlemoduslimit.operator.ID, ID is an operator id).

      • IGNORE_LIMIT

        @Deprecated
static final Integer IGNORE_LIMIT
        Deprecated. 
        Not in use. The max limit is set ( see RESULT_LIMIT )

    • Method Detail

      • resetCache

        void resetCache()
        Resets cache of single mode

      • getSingleModeResult

        SingleModeResult getSingleModeResult(String sessionId)
        Gets the data to be shown in the mail inbox.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session id of inbox mode
        Returns:
        SingleModeResult

      • getSessionId

        String getSessionId(boolean startPanel,
                  String status,
                  String sender,
                  long emaildate,
                  int type,
                  List<Integer> subprojectIds,
                  int limit)
        Gets session id for getSingleModeResult(String). It's used to check the status of the request or to get result data ( SingleModes ) from the server.
        Parameters:
        startPanel - true if this function will be called from welcome panel
        status - status of mails that will be shown
        sender - sender of mails that will be shown
        emaildate - email date of mails that will be shown
        type - type of mails that will be shown
        subprojectIds - list of subproject ids that contains mails
        limit - limit of mails
        Returns:
        session id

      • loadSingleModeOperatorList

        Map<Integer,String> loadSingleModeOperatorList()
        Loads all the operators to show which operator locks the mail. The format is
        Returns:
        Map with operator strings and their ids
        was:
        getSingleModusMitarbeiterListe

                                 int limit)

      • loadPersonalRequeueInfo

        List<PersonalRequeueInfo> loadPersonalRequeueInfo(boolean startPanel,
                                                String sender,
                                                long emaildate,
                                                int type,
                                                List<Integer> subprojectIds,
                                                int limit)
        Gets requeue data for a dash board
        Parameters:
        startPanel - true if this function will be called from welcome panel
        status - status of mails that will be shown
        sender - sender of mails that will be shown
        emaildate - email date of mails that will be shown
        type - type of mails that will be shown
        subprojectIds - list of subproject ids that contains mails
        limit - limit of mails
        Returns:
        List of PersonalRequeueInfo
